item.title: No unsolicited mail
item.author: Mazen Almaskati,
item.description: Just last week, Camden’s very own Roundhouse opened its doors to artists and industry professionals as part of their Artist Toolkit Day. The event included a series of performances, clinics, talks and collaborations during the weeklong Roundhouse Rising Festival. I made my way to the iconic venue on …

item.title: Ante Up | a new age of hip hop
item.author: Felix Editor,Mazen Almaskati,
item.description: For a form of music so deeply rooted in a culture of self-certainty and dazzling bravado, you might not expect artists of the genre to be tackling sensitive issues relating to isolation, depression, violence and substance abuse. This however, is exactly what we’ve seen take place with fresh new …
